column4: hi I could not boot from live cd until i changed mode to vesa. Why my ATI Radeon 4670 (which should be the best supported in foss drivers) can no enter in normal mode ?
I saw that ubottu and blacnk screen has gone when i chose vesa but I think I should be able to boot in normal.... I tried to turn off everything on F6 but if I choose normal I get black screen
IT also says on lspci it is kernel module: radeon but lsmod does not show radeon at all... I think it uses some other module..
you may need a driver try the nomodeset option.
